mapper.select: select mno, mname, mcost, pro_no, mcontent, mdate, mnum, mcount, delyn, dcost, fundcount , (mcount - fundcount) as remain from (select fm.mno as mno, mname, mcost, fm.pro_no as pro_no, mcontent, mdate, mnum, mcount, delyn, dcost , nvl(f1.fundcount, 0) as fundcount from fundmenu fm left join (select sum(fundcount) as fundcount, mno from fundlist group by mno) f1 on f1.mno=fm.mno) where pro_no=#{pro_no} order by mno

select f2.mno, mname, mcost, f2.pro_no, mcontent, to_char(mdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')as s_mdate, mnum, mcount, delyn, dcost , fundcount, (mcount - f1.fundcount) as remain from (select sum(fundcount)fundcount, mno from fundlist group by mno) f1 right join fundmenu f2 on f1.mno=f2.mno where f2.pro_no = #{pro_no} order by f2.mno
select mno from fundmenu where pro_no = #{pro_no} and mnum = #{mnum}
mapper.insert: insert into fundmenu values (seq_mno.nextval, #{mname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcost, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pro_no}, #{mcontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{s_mdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{mnum}, #{mcount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delyn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcost, jdbcType=INTEGER})
